snippet: Hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians have found their way into Russia, clinging to promises of work, shelter, pensions and a path to citizenship.
abstract: United Nations reports that hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians displaced because of the war have found their way into Russia, clinging to promises of work, shelter, pensions and a path to citizenship.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians have found their way into Russia, clinging to promises of work, shelter, pensions and a path to citizenship.

headline.main: Shellshocked Ukrainians Flee to New Lives in Russia
headline.print_headline: Shellshocked Ukrainians Flee to New Lives in Russia
